Plot: Under threat by fundamentalist terrorists, a group of Trappist monks stationed with an impoverished Algerian community must decide whether to leave or stay.
Title: Of Gods and Men
Actors: Lambert Wilson, Michael Lonsdale, Olivier Rabourdin, Philippe Laudenbach
tomatoConsensus: Patient and restrained, Of Gods and Men asks deep, profound questions that will linger in the audience's mind long after the movie.
Awards: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 18 wins & 27 nominations.
